prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with a round body and a unique camouflage pattern.
Imagine a Pokemon that blends into its surroundings and has a soft, fluffy appearance.
Show me a small, earthy Pokemon with a shell that resembles a rock.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in forests and has features reminiscent of insects.
Generate a Pokemon with a bulbous shape and a tough exterior for defense.
Give me an adorable Pokemon that can hide in plain sight using natural materials.
Make a Pokemon that can change its appearance based on its environment.
